operation.name: insert
operation.sql: insert into dnm_invest_price_cost (id, guid, biz_id, trans_type, trans_sub_type, orig_trans_amt, trans_rate, trans_amt, trans_currency, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?, ?, ? ,?, ?, ?)

operation.name: load
operation.sql: select id, guid, biz_id, trans_type, trans_sub_type, orig_trans_amt, trans_rate, trans_amt, trans_currency, memo, gmt_create, gmt_modified from dnm_invest_price_cost where id = ?
